title: Observations in equity markets (largely non-psychological)
summary: quick read before making any bet

body.raw:
1. Note that in general, the best position to be in the stock market is long. Most dips get v-reversed, and genuine economic deterioration
takes a long time.

2. Hence, when the market has already gone down by ~10% or more, there is little point in selling. P/Es will likely be sufficient to protect
against significant downside.
